mods.abstract: $20 Reward. Ranaway from the undersigned, in Pine Prairie, in this Parish, in the night of the 20th of November last, a mulatto man named CHARLES, aged about 30 years, about 5 feet 9 or 10 inches high, having the first phalanx of the thumb on the right hand cut off. Charles speaks french and english, and is the same that the undersigned has purchased at the sale of the estate of the late Jacques Lastrapes. A reward of $20 will be given to whoever shall bring back said boy to the undersigned, or fifteen dollars for his delivery to Mr. Cazeaux, in Ville Plate, or ten dollars if he is lodged in jail. E. DARDEAU. Pine Prairie, St. Landry, Dec. 15, 1855.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
